    Data Templates

    Data-Templates.Rmd

    Data templates for ghgtools R package are available for download here. Each template has some example data. Please ensure to delete the example data before entering your own data.

    Activity Data Template

    The Activity Data template will contain each record of activity data for your GHG inventory. Download it from the above link and do not change the file name. It looks like this


    asset_id supplier account_id meter_number date year cost service_type service_subcategory1 service_subcategory2 unit usage
    B1456 2023 Electricity kWh 31231.907
    B1457 2023 Electricity kWh 19389.588
    B1458 2023 Electricity kWh 185862.407
    B1458 2023 Natural Gas therms 2569.690
    B1564 2023 Electricity kWh 47302.603
    B1564 2023 Natural Gas therms 1382.843
    B1662 2023 Electricity kWh 106760.001
    B1662 2023 Natural Gas therms 3541.052
    B1663 2023 Electricity kWh 74746.451

    B2074 2023 Electricity kWh 49348.000
    B2074 2023 Natural Gas therms 25.981
    Enterprise 2023 Capital Goods Manufacturing Electronic Computer Manufacturing USD 22219.240

    Enterprise 2023 Employee Commuting Ground Travel Passenger Car vehicle-mile 70000.000
    Enterprise 2023 Employee Commuting Rail Travel Transit Rail passenger-mile 84000.000
    Enterprise 2023 Employee Commuting Ground Travel Bus passenger-mile 3000.000


    Data validation rules for each column are explained below


    AssetID - Required input - Must be alpha-numeric - Must match an AssetID from your Asset Portfolio (see below for more details)


    Vendor - Optional input (can be left blank) - Name of the utility vendor or supplier


    AccountNumber - Optional input (can be left blank) - Account number for utility service


    MeterNumber - Optional input (can be left blank) - Meter number for utility service


    Date - Required input - Must be in date format - For monthly billing, enter either the start date or end data of the billing cycle (you can choose either, but be consistent)


    Cost - Optional input (can be left blank) - Must be numeric


    ServiceType - Required input - Must be one of the following (entered exactly as shown)


    ServiceType
    Asphalt and Road Oil
    Aviation Gasoline
    Biodiesel (100%)
    Business Travel
    Butane
    Butylene
    Capital Goods
    Chilled Water
    Compressed Natural Gas (CNG)
    Crude Oil
    Diesel Fuel
    Distillate Fuel Oil No.Â 1
    Distillate Fuel Oil No.Â 2
    Distillate Fuel Oil No.Â 4
    Electricity
    Employee Commuting
    Ethane
    Ethanol (100%)
    Ethylene
    Heavy Gas Oils
    Isobutane
    Isobutylene
    Kerosene
    Kerosene-Type Jet Fuel
    Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG)
    Liquefied Petroleum Gases (LPG)
    Lubricants
    Motor Gasoline
    Naphtha (<401 deg F)
    Natural Gas
    Natural Gasoline
    Other Oil (>401 deg F)
    Pentanes Plus
    Petrochemical Feedstocks
    Propane
    Propylene
    Purchased Goods and Services
    Residual Fuel Oil
    Residual Fuel Oil No.Â 5
    Residual Fuel Oil No.Â 6
    Special Naphtha
    Steam
    Unfinished Oils
    Used Oil


    UOM - Required input - Unit Of Measure for the activity data - e.g.Â kWh for electric, Gallons for gasoline


    Usage - Required input - Total quantity of usage for the record of activity data - units = UOM

    Asset Portfolio Template

    The Asset Portfolio template is a record of every single asset in your portfolio that consumes energy and/or emits GHG emissions. In most cases, these assets will be buildings, vehicles, or other kinds of equipment. Each record of data should be mutually exclusive. E.g., if you are accounting for energy from a boiler as itâ€™s own asset, do not include that energy consumption in the building asset. Download the template from the above link and do not change the file name. It looks like this


    asset_id address city state zip country sqft region business_unit asset_type asset_subtype year_built
    B1456 Bellingham Washington 98226 United States 342 West Coast Operations Building Office 1993
    B1457 Bellingham Washington 98225 United States 3280 West Coast Operations Building Office 2005
    B1458 Bellingham Washington 98225 United States 20142 West Coast Operations Building Office 2003
    B1564 Woodinville Washington 98072 United States 3636 West Coast Operations Building Office 1990
    B1662 Portland Oregon 97202 United States 4821 West Coast Operations Building Office 2007
    B1663 Portland Oregon 97229 United States 4316 West Coast Operations Building Office 2015
    B1866 Sacramento California 95816 United States 6074 West Coast Operations Building Office 1999
    B1867 Sacramento California 95825 United States 3959 West Coast Operations Building Office 2004
    B1868 Sacramento California 95825 United States 8070 West Coast Operations Building Office 2004
    B2074 Indio California 92203 United States 3543 West Coast Operations Building Office 2010
    Enterprise United States West Coast Enterprise


    Data validation rules for each column are explained below


    AssetID - Required input - Must be alpha-numeric - Must be unique from any other AssetID


    Address, City, State - Optional input (can be left blank) - Mapping functions will not work as intended if left blank


    ZIP - Required input - Must be 5-digit numeric zip code


    Country - Required input - Currently support only offered for USA & Canada


    SQFT - Optional input (can be left blank) - Must be numeric - If left blank, certain metrics will not calculate for building asset types


    Region - Optional input (can be left blank) - Can be any value


    BuisnessUnit - Optional input (can be left blank) - Can be any value


    AssetType - Required Input - Choose from the following: Building, Vehicle, Equipment


    AssetSubType - Optional input (can be left blank) - If left blank, certain metrics will not calculate - If AssetType = Building, chose from the following options


    Building_Type
    Education
    Food sales
    Food service
    Health care
    Inpatient Health care
    Outpatient Health care
    Lodging
    Mercantile
    Retail (other than mall) Mercantile
    Enclosed and strip malls Mercantile
    Office
    Public assembly
    Public order and safety
    Religious worship
    Service
    Warehouse and storage
    Other
    Vacant


    - If AssetType = Vehicle, chose from the following options


    Vehicle_Type
    Medium- and Heavy-Duty Truck
    Passenger Car
    Light-Duty Truck
    Waterborne Craft
    Aircraft


    - If AssetType = Equipment, chose from the following options


    Equipment_Type
    Landscaping Tools
    Lawn Mower
    Boiler
    Generator
    Other


    YearBuilt - Optional input (can be left blank) - Must be a 4 digit numeric year
